rows.label: qst701501_msg0001
rows.name:
My, my, you dears. I was
just thinking I needed to
ask someone for a favor.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0002
rows.name:
Actually, I'm going to die soon.
I'm sick... Ah, it's fine. At my
age, death is like a friend.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0003
rows.name:
I've seen many of my friends
off... Now it's finally
my turn. Besides...

rows.label: qst701501_msg0004
rows.name:
All souls will be saved. I believe
in the teachings of Acedia.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0005
rows.name:
...What was I talking about? Oh, yes.
My one regret is a vase I promised to
an old friend that isn't finished yet.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0006
rows.name:
For the finishing touches, if you
happen to have the necessary materials,
could I possibly have them?

rows.label: qst701501_msg0007
rows.name:
Two Spiral Mistletoe, four
Silverwing Quartz, and four
Eternity Loam. That's all.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0008
rows.name:
If you happen to get them,
it would be a great help
if you could share.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, yes. I've heard that long ago,
you could find a lot of Eternity
Loam in the Loftin Nature Preserve.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0010
rows.name:
It's a precious thing now, so I
don't know if any is left, but I
think it's worth looking for.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0011
rows.name:
Well then, if you happen to find it
while you're doing something else, that
would be fine. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst701501_msg0012
rows.name:
Knowing him, I'm sure he's already
forgotten, fufu. But I want to
keep my promise before I go.
